backend/main.mo: Stores contact messages and provides submit and query functions with basic validation.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature update involving chair rotation in the 3D cafe scene and lists related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Outlines the backend deploy, frontend build, and runtime steps with diagnostic guidelines.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS custom properties for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Instructions for embedding the static 3D cafe build into WordPress using Elementor.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring the 3D scene, navigation, panels, theme provider, and startup error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Frame component adding contour-texture background and styled container wrapping children.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Panel wrapper with title bar, close button, scrollable content, and contour-styled frame.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button showing a tooltip and triggering the onboarding overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo and buttons opening About, Contact, and Menu panels.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Deploym: Overlay displaying deployment/runtime errors with diagnostics, expandable details, and retry support.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: Renders a dialog explaining 3D navigation, interaction tips, and a start button for first‑time onboarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithErrorHand: Wraps actor creation with error reporting, retry logic, and diagnostic logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppViewport.ts: Updates a CSS variable with the visual viewport height to stabilize mobile layout during browser chrome changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Tracks whether onboarding has been dismissed using localStorage and exposes dismiss controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context for authentication, loading stored identities, and managing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages with diagnostics and runtime validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, Tailwind layers, color variables, and viewport‑safe layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: Presents an About panel with static text describing the cafe, community, quality, and visit details inside a right-side sheet.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, message submission via hooks, and displays contact details and past messages.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Provides a WordPress export panel with a download link, installation steps, feature notes, and support info.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Renders a menu panel with tabbed sections for coffee, pastries, and desserts, including navigation triggers to other panels.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Defines the 3D cafe scene with basic lighting, fallback room rendering, navigation hooks, and error handling.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeCharac: Stub component that returns null to disable character rendering.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeDogs.t: Places two dog character models in the scene with predefined positions, rotations, and styling.
frontend/src/scene/characters/CafeHumans: Places three static HumanCharacter instances at fixed positions in the cafe.
frontend/src/scene/characters/characterM: Provides shared character material hooks and color palettes for humans and dogs.
frontend/src/scene/characters/DogCharact: Defines a static low‑poly dog built from simple meshes with configurable fur color and scale.
frontend/src/scene/characters/HumanChara: Creates a static low‑poly human with configurable skin, clothing, and optional seated posture.
frontend/src/scene/components/MenuBoardF: Renders an emissive neon-style frame outline using a generated shape geometry.
frontend/src/scene/components/WallFrameL: Generates a high‑resolution canvas texture to display text on a plane label.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Implements keyboard and pointer-based first‑person navigation with touch support.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Renders a minimal fallback cafe room with walls, floor, contour textures, and basic furniture.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Builds the full café environment including floor, ceiling, walls, furniture, contour overlays, and mount signaling.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Defines 3D furniture components such as the counter, table, and wooden chair with contour-textured materials.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds props like an espresso machine, grinder, pastry case, and menu board with glow and label dressing.
frontend/src/scene/environment/Commercia: Implements a detailed commercial espresso machine model with group heads, wands, and metal materials.
frontend/src/scene/HomeCafeCanvas.tsx: Sets up the Three.js canvas, manages loading and errors, checks WebGL support, and mounts the CafeScene with retry logic.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useContourTextu: Loads a contour texture and produces configured variants for floors, walls, and furniture.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: Loads textures asynchronously with success/failure logging and optional error callbacks.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Provides a watchdog timer that triggers if the scene fails to render within a timeout and supports canceling.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useWallMapTextu: Loads and configures the green world‑map wall texture with wrapping, repeat, and filtering settings.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Controls an auto-opening door based on camera distance using smooth rotation animation.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Interactive rotating box that responds to drag gestures and displays a hint overlay while inspected.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Empty placeholder file for interaction management.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Floating interactive props (card, cup, sign) with hover/press animations and click activation.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Renders rotating POI markers with hover and dwell detection, triggering panel activation when looked at or clicked.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Registry defining POI metadata including positions, labels, and actions.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Checks camera distance to predefined zones and displays an activation overlay when the user enters one.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Empty placeholder file for scene panel props.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Utility functions for creating contour, wood, metal, and overlay materials with predefined styles.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: Error boundary that captures scene render errors and resets on retry using a reset key.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: Overlay shown when only the fallback room loads, offering retry and diagnostic messaging.
Error overlay displaying failure messages, optional diagnostics, and a retry button.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: Loading overlay with a fallback degraded state after a timeout and optional retry logic.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Scene diagnostics utilities for logging failures, successes, and formatting diagnostic stage labels.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL support and required extensions, returning a status and reason.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Defines a Zustand store for tracking the active UI overlay panel.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Provides motion timing, easing, spring presets, and a helper to build CSS transitions.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Defines design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Logs deployment-related errors with context, formatted output, and remediation hints.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and feature definitions for the 3D Cafe project.
